headline: Gutfeld: Hillary, Harvey and Hollywood
subHeadline: Every pig gets a pass when you're progressive.

utterances.speaker: HILLARY CLINTON, FORMER DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL NOMINEE
utterances.sentences: I was just sick. I was shocked. I was appalled. It was something that was just intolerable in every way. And you know, like so many people who have come forward and spoken out, this was a different side of a person who I and many others had known in the past. if (window && window.foxstrike && Array.isArray(window.foxstrike.cmd)) { window.foxstrike.cmd.push(function(Strike) { Strike.insertAd('tablet', 'lb3', 'tablet-tw-ad-lb3', ''); }); } else { console.error('Error: window.foxstrike not found'); } Excellent software, but a little late, don't you think? utterances.speaker: FAREED ZAKARIA, CNN
utterances.sentences: would you have called him a friend? if (window && window.foxstrike && Array.isArray(window.foxstrike.cmd)) { window.foxstrike.cmd.push(function(Strike) { Strike.insertAd('desktop', 'lb3', 'desktop-desk-ad-lb3', ''); }); } else { console.error('Error: window.foxstrike not found'); } if (window && window.foxstrike && Array.isArray(window.foxstrike.cmd)) { window.foxstrike.cmd.push(function(Strike) { Strike.insertAd('mobile', 'ban4', 'mobile-mw-ad-ban4', ''); }); } else { console.error('Error: window.foxstrike not found'); }

utterances.speaker: CLINTON
utterances.sentences: Yes, I probably would have. And so would so many others. People in Democratic politics for a couple of decades appreciated his help and support. Yes, he poured money into campaigns -- campaigns that offered him the ideal cover for his deplorable behavior. Every pig gets a pass, when you're progressive. if (window && window.foxstrike && Array.isArray(window.foxstrike.cmd)) { window.foxstrike.cmd.push(function(Strike) { Strike.insertAd('tablet', 'lb5', 'tablet-tw-ad-lb5', ''); }); } else { console.error('Error: window.foxstrike not found'); } if (window && window.foxstrike && Array.isArray(window.foxstrike.cmd)) { window.foxstrike.cmd.push(function(Strike) { Strike.insertAd('mobile', 'ban5', 'mobile-mw-ad-ban5', ''); }); } else { console.error('Error: window.foxstrike not found'); } By the way, I love how Hillary says she'll donate the money she got from Harvey. That's just recirculating the cash. Why not just give the money back?

utterances.speaker: ZAKARIA
utterances.sentences: Would you give the money back? if (window && window.foxstrike && Array.isArray(window.foxstrike.cmd)) { window.foxstrike.cmd.push(function(Strike) { Strike.insertAd('mobile', 'ban6', 'mobile-mw-ad-ban6', ''); }); } else { console.error('Error: window.foxstrike not found'); }

utterances.speaker: CLINTON
utterances.sentences: Well, there's nobody to give it back to. What other people are saying, what my former colleagues are saying is they are going to donate it to charity. Of course, I would do that. if (window && window.foxstrike && Array.isArray(window.foxstrike.cmd)) { window.foxstrike.cmd.push(function(Strike) { Strike.insertAd('desktop', 'lb4', 'desktop-desk-ad-lb4', ''); }); } else { console.error('Error: window.foxstrike not found'); } if (window && window.foxstrike && Array.isArray(window.foxstrike.cmd)) { window.foxstrike.cmd.push(function(Strike) { Strike.insertAd('tablet', 'lb6', 'tablet-tw-ad-lb6', ''); }); } else { console.error('Error: window.foxstrike not found'); } She can't give the money back? Yes, you can. Write the check to "Harvey Weinstein" and send it to him. I suspect she knows where to find him. I also suspect he'll need the money -- soon. if (window && window.foxstrike && Array.isArray(window.foxstrike.cmd)) { window.foxstrike.cmd.push(function(Strike) { Strike.insertAd('mobile', 'ban7', 'mobile-mw-ad-ban7', ''); }); } else { console.error('Error: window.foxstrike not found'); } Second: It's hard for Hillary to condemn a cad when she stood by one for so long. In a way, she's the personification of Hollywood: It's hard to speak out when you've tolerated such crap for decades. Remember, the women who came out about Bill? They were dismissed by you know who. Hillary's not much different from those Hollywood A-listers who knew for years and traded sordid details like baseball cards. And that's the point: This was not Harvey's secret. This was Hollywood's secret. He was brazen. He never tried to hide it. He just assumed his politics and power had him covered. if (window && window.foxstrike && Array.isArray(window.foxstrike.cmd)) { window.foxstrike.cmd.push(function(Strike) { Strike.insertAd('tablet', 'lb7', 'tablet-tw-ad-lb7', ''); }); } else { console.error('Error: window.foxstrike not found'); } And he was right. For a while.

utterances.speaker: Today, it's Harvey Weinstein who Hillary finally addresses
HILLARY CLINTON, FORMER DEMOCRATIC PRESIDENTIAL NOMINEE
utterances.utterance: I was just sick. I was shocked. I was appalled. It was something that was just intolerable in every way. And you know, like so many people who have come forward and spoken out, this was a different side of a person who I and many others had known in the past. Excellent software, but a little late, don't you think? Some are hammering her for waiting so long, but can you blame her? First, Harvey's a friend. I mean, wouldn't you have called him a friend?

utterances.speaker: FAREED ZAKARIA, CNN
utterances.utterance: would you have called him a friend?

utterances.speaker: CLINTON
utterances.utterance: Yes, I probably would have. And so would so many others. People in Democratic politics for a couple of decades appreciated his help and support. Yes, he poured money into campaigns -- campaigns that offered him the ideal cover for his deplorable behavior. Every pig gets a pass, when you're progressive. By the way, I love how Hillary says she'll donate the money she got from Harvey. That's just recirculating the cash. Why not just give the money back?

utterances.speaker: ZAKARIA
utterances.utterance: Would you give the money back?

utterances.speaker: CLINTON
utterances.utterance: Well, there's nobody to give it back to. What other people are saying, what my former colleagues are saying is they are going to donate it to charity. Of course, I would do that. She can't give the money back? Yes, you can. Write the check to "Harvey Weinstein" and send it to him. I suspect she knows where to find him. I also suspect he'll need the money -- soon.

utterances.speaker: Second
utterances.utterance: It's hard for Hillary to condemn a cad when she stood by one for so long. In a way, she's the personification of Hollywood: It's hard to speak out when you've tolerated such crap for decades. Remember, the women who came out about Bill? They were dismissed by you know who. Hillary's not much different from those Hollywood A-listers who knew for years and traded sordid details like baseball cards.

utterances.speaker: And that's the point
utterances.utterance: This was not Harvey's secret. This was Hollywood's secret. He was brazen. He never tried to hide it. He just assumed his politics and power had him covered. And he was right. For a while.
